titles.title: Climate Readiness Act of 2021
Climate Readiness Act of 2021
To direct the Secretary of Defense to submit to Congress a report on the national security implications of climate change.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Climate Readiness Act of 2021
This bill requires the Department of Defense to report on the national security implications associated with climate change and strategies and approaches for responding to climate change. The report must be submitted in an unclassified form, but may contain a classified annex.
